content: {A想象中}I heard that if you want to live somewhere, you have to talk to someone from Loomi Co.... At least that's how it went in Masked Bugcatcher, mm~!

content: After I move in, I want to learn everything I can from you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! {A想到了}<style=SizeSmall>That way I'll become a true Masked Bugcatcher... won't I?</style>

content: {沉醉闻}Mhm, I can sense more Kabutomaru nearby... Mmph?! It's not just Kabutomaru, there's also... something delicious! Mmm, better wipe the drool from my mouth...
